mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.projectcode AS "projectcode", a.projectname AS "projectname", a.costype AS "costype", a.unit AS "unit", a.productrate AS "productrate", a.product AS "product", a.year17 AS "year", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.year18 AS "year18", a.year19 AS "year19", a.year20 AS "year20", a.year21 AS "year21", a.year22 AS "year22", a.year23 AS "year23", a.year24 AS "year24", a.year25 AS "year25", a.year26 AS "year26", a.year27 AS "year27"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fea_costinfo( id, projectcode, projectname, costype, unit, productrate, product, year17, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, year18, year19, year20, year21, year22, year23, year24, year25, year26, year27 ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{projectcode}, #{projectname}, #{costype}, #{unit}, #{productrate}, #{product}, #{year}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{year18}, #{year19}, #{year20}, #{year21}, #{year22}, #{year23}, #{year24}, #{year25}, #{year26}, #{year27} )
mapper.update: UPDATE fea_costinfo SET projectcode = #{projectcode}, projectname = #{projectname}, costype = #{costype}, unit = #{unit}, productrate = #{productrate}, product = #{product}, year17 = #{year}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, year18 = #{year18}, year19 = #{year19}, year20 = #{year20}, year21 = #{year21}, year22 = #{year22}, year23 = #{year23}, year24 = #{year24}, year25 = #{year25}, year26 = #{year26}, year27 = #{year27} WHERE id = #{id}
